Encoders Notes
I made a small script to crop & re-size.
 I dropped that into vdubmod.
 There i lowered the brightness,
 increased the contrast, gamma & satiration.
 Then i de-noised it, used a color de-noiser,
 changed the colors with a rgb eq & sharpened it.
 Finaly i re-encoded the audio & muxed it back to the video.
 It looks realy good imo.
 Download the sample first to check that your happy with the quality.
 Enjoy...
